import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import Swal from 'sweetalert2' export default function List(props) { // Xóa sản phẩm const onHandleClick = (id) => { Swal.fire({ title: 'Are you sure?', text: "Deleted data will not be recoverable!", icon: 'warning', showCancelButton: true, confirmButtonColor: '#3085d6', cancelButtonColor: '#d33', confirmButtonText: 'Yes, delete it!' }).then((result) => { if (result.value) { onRemove(id) Swal.fire( 'Deleted!', 'Your file has been deleted.', 'success' ) } }) }; return (
